name: Hexaman
description:
Purely a fast-paced boss rush game. Hexaman's fascinating story mode is unfortunately just an illusion.

The game is pretty straightforward, but also quite hard. If you keep at it, please let me know how far you went, or better yet, that you beat it.

Made within 3 days for Weekly Game Jam 52 - Theme : Boss Rush

Controls :

- Right and left arrows to move

- Up arrow to jump

- E to shoot
